item.title: The Gal Gadot ‘Controversy’
item.description: The actress is a proud Israeli Jew, and she doesn’t care that some people have a problem with that.

item.title: Elon Musk and the Freedom Conservatives
item.description: The FreeCons have a long way to go from where they are now to where they wish to go next.

item.title: Ukraine Never Turned Down a Survivable Deal
item.description: What we know about the negotiations suggests that there was never a deal on the table that would have left Ukraine secure from Russian conquest.

item.title: It’s Time for the Supreme Court to Stop Censorship in Science and Medicine
item.description: Kaley Chiles’s challenge to Colorado’s efforts to censor her counseling conversations with her clients is a chance for the Court to stem a dangerous t...

item.title: Notre Dame, Back to Life After the 2019 Fire
item.description: The restoration is a technical triumph, but the cathedral is as much Gothic Revival as Gothic.
